name: Society (itch)
description:
Best played in fullscreen. I'm hopefully going to change the color scheme.

You are the current #1 detective in all of your city. One day, you get a call to investigate the Prime Minister's death. Only there is one problem.

YOU KILLED HIM

Made in Twine. Music by 21stFret (would be, but couldn't sort out audio bugs). Coding by fragmenta (me).
